item.description:
A night at the Hasty Pudding Theatricals. Limited to 6 guests. Sign up soon Cost of event is $38.  Show up for the show at 7:30 prompt! A good time is assured for all!

Please RSVP! first come, first served.
item.why: "Kashmir If You Can" is in its 163rd reincarnation, The Hasty Pudding Theatricals takes you on a magical journey to the greatest subcontinent in the world – the exotic and erotic land of India – as we unveil the eccentric epic " Kashmir If You Can".
item.name: An evening at The Hasty Pudding with an optional dinner preceeding
